General.Name: PowerTECH Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: PowerTECH Co., Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, and markets semiconductor post packaging related automated equipment worldwide. The company offers semiconductor automated testing equipment; laser marking systems; vision systems, including orientation inspection, 3D inspection, marking inspection, and tape seal stations; automatic tray exchange, opto coupler high voltage test, and opto coupler tube to tube test handlers; and other automated equipment. Its semiconductor automated testing equipment are used in semiconductor discrete device testing, and analog and mixed signal IC testing; and laser marking systems in semiconductor chip and device marking. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Foshan, China.

1.Name: Mr. Kai  Li
